content.text:
# 2016 Empire Slovak Open – Singles

Kateřina Siniaková
| runner =  Anastasija Sevastova
| score  = 7–6(7–4), 5–7, 6–0
| type     = singles doubles
}}
Danka Kovinić was the defending champion, but chose to participate in Rome instead.
Kateřina Siniaková won the title, defeating Anastasija Sevastova in the final, 7–6(7–4), 5–7, 6–0.
Seeds
Magdaléna Rybáriková (first round, retired)
#  Çağla Büyükakçay (second round)
#  Anastasija Sevastova (final)
#  Zarina Diyas (semifinals)
#  Kristýna Plíšková (quarterfinals)
#  Magda Linette (second round)
#  Stefanie Vögele (withdrew)
#  Andreea Mitu (first round)
}}
